GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review object by its assigned review_id

review.title: Culture a Love of Agriculture With Agricola
review.review_body: You could sum up Agricola with the simple phrase 'Farmyard Fun' but the mechanics and game play add so much more than that. You'll find yourself torn between breeding pigs, or sowing crops. Its joyeous and rewarding and it makes you think of time spent outside, which is much harder to do these days!

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Updates a specific review, currently only supports vote incrementation

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment with assigned comment_id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments associated with a given review

comments.body: Quis duis mollit ad enim deserunt.
comments.author: jessjelly

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: Posts a comment, associating it with the review_id, and serves that posted comment back

GET /api/users/:username.description: Serves a user object with matching username value

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates a given comments votes key by the value requested
